ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot password
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter the email address you registered with and we will send you a password reset link.

ResetPasswordPage.resetSuccess: Password reset successful. Redirecting to login page in 2 seconds...

AddMatchPage.description: To add a new match, fill in the informations below

AddDebtPage.description: To add a new debt, fill in the informations below
AddDebtPage.playerDebtPlaceholder: Select how much does a player owe you
AddDebtPage.cristianDebtPlaceholder: Select how much you owe a player
AddDebtPage.reasonPlaceholder: Write the reason to why you are adding debt

AddLocationPage.description: To add a new location, fill in the input below

VerifyEmail.verificationSuccess: Your email has been successfully verified! Redirecting to login page...
VerifyEmail.verificationError: There was an error verifying your email. Please try again or contact support.

GenericMessages.USER_CREATED: If user with that email doesn't exist already, we have sent you an email verification link!
GenericMessages.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: If user with that email doesn't exist already, we have sent you an email verification link!
GenericMessages.USER_VERIFIED: User is successfully verified. Now you can login!
GenericMessages.USER_DOESNT_EXIST: If user with this email exists, we have sent a verification email!
GenericMessages.VERIFICATION_EMAIL_COOLDOWN: Please wait {time} seconds before requesting another verification email.
GenericMessages.ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED_RESENT: Email not verified. A new verification email has been sent.
GenericMessages.ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED_RATE_LIMIT: Email not verified. Please wait 5 minutes before requesting another verification email.
GenericMessages.ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED_FAILED: Email not verified. Failed to resend verification email.
GenericMessages.ERROR_CHECKING_USER_EXISTENCE: There was an error checking user existence. Please try again!
GenericMessages.ERROR_FINDING_USER: We couldn't find user after registration!
GenericMessages.ERROR_REGISTER_VERIFICATION_TOKEN_EXPIRE: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one by trying to login again!
GenericMessages.FAILED_REGISTRATION: Failed to register user. Please try again!
GenericMessages.FAILED_TO_VERIFY_USER: Failed to verify user. Please try again!
GenericMessages.INVALID_LOGIN: Invalid login credentials. Please try again.
GenericMessages.INVALID_REGISTER: Registration failed. Please check your information and try again.
GenericMessages.INVALID_LOGOUT: An error occurred during logout. Please try again.
GenericMessages.INVALID_JWT_TOKEN: Invalid authentication token. Please log in again.
GenericMessages.NO_JWT_FOUND: No authentication token found. Please log in.
GenericMessages.JWT_DECODE_ERROR: Error processing authentication token. Please log in again.
GenericMessages.JWT_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please log in again!
GenericMessages.REFRESH_TOKEN_SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please log in again!
GenericMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_REQUEST_FAILED: Failed to request password reset. Please try again later.
GenericMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_LINK_SENT: If an account exists for that email, we have sent a password reset link.
GenericMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED: Failed to reset password. The link may be invalid or expired. Please request a new password reset.
GenericMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
GenericMessages.INVALID_RESET_PASSWORD_TOKEN: Reset password link is invalid or expired
GenericMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_RATE_LIMITED: Please wait 5 minutes before requesting another password reset
GenericMessages.REGISTER_VERIFICATION_TOKEN_EMAIL_SENT: Verification email sent successfully. Please check your email!
GenericMessages.REGISTER_VERIFICATION_EMAIL_FAILED: Failed to send verification email. Please try again later.
GenericMessages.MATCH_CREATION_FAILED: Failed to create a match. Please try again!
GenericMessages.MATCH_CREATION_RATE_LIMITED: Please wait 5 minutes before creating another match
GenericMessages.DEBT_CREATION_FAILED: Failed to add a debt. Please try again!
GenericMessages.DEBT_CREATION_RATE_LIMITED: Please wait 5 minutes before adding another debt
GenericMessages.LOCATION_CREATION_FAILED: Failed to add location. Please try again!
GenericMessages.REDIS_CONNECTION_ERROR: Unable to connect to the database. Please try again later.
GenericMessages.REDIS_DISCONNECTION_ERROR: Error occurred while disconnecting from the database.
GenericMessages.REDIS_GET_ERROR: Unable to retrieve data from the cache. Please try again.
GenericMessages.REDIS_SET_ERROR: Unable to store data in the cache. Please try again.
GenericMessages.REDIS_DELETE_ERROR: Unable to delete data from the cache. Please try again.
GenericMessages.REDIS_SCAN_ERROR: Unable to scan data from the cache. Please try again.
GenericMessages.REDIS_CLIENT_ERROR: An error occurred with the database client. Please try again later.
GenericMessages.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests, please try again in a minute!
GenericMessages.LOGIN_RATE_LIMIT: Too many login attempts, please try again after a minute
GenericMessages.REGISTER_RATE_LIMIT: Too many registration attempts, please try again after a minute
GenericMessages.VERIFY_EMAIL_RATE_LIMIT: Too many verification attempts, please try again after a minute
GenericMessages.NETWORK_ERROR: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
GenericMessages.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
GenericMessages.UNAUTHORIZED: You are forbidden to do this. Please try to refresh the page or relog.
GenericMessages.AUTHORIZED: You are authorized for this action!

ZodErrors.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 6 characters long
ZodErrors.FULL_NAME_TOO_LONG: Full name cannot be more than 100 characters
ZodErrors.PHONE_NUMBER_TOO_LONG: Phone number cannot be more than 20 characters
ZodErrors.PICK_CORRECT_GENDER: Gender must be Male, Female, or Other
ZodErrors.PRICE_REQUIRED: Price must be a positive value
ZodErrors.TEAM_NAME_TOO_LONG: Team name cannot be more than 255 characters
ZodErrors.MATCH_TYPE_TOO_LONG: Match type cannot be more than 100 characters
ZodErrors.MATCH_GENDER_REQUIRED: Match gender must be Male, Female, or Other
ZodErrors.PLAYER_DEBT_REQUIRED: Player debt must be a non-negative decimal
ZodErrors.CRISTIAN_DEBT_REQUIRED: Cristian debt must be a non-negative decimal
ZodErrors.REASON_REQUIRED: Reason for the debt is required

EmailTemplateMessages.REGISTRATION_THANK_YOU: Thank you for signing up. To complete your registration, please verify your email address.
EmailTemplateMessages.BUTTON_NOT_WORKING: If the button above does not work, you can also copy and paste the following link into your browser:
EmailTemplateMessages.IGNORE_IF_NOT_SIGNED_UP: If you did not sign up for Cris Futbol, you can safely ignore this email.
EmailTemplateMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_REQUEST_RECEIVED: We received a request to reset your password. If you did not make this request, you can safely ignore this email.
EmailTemplateMessages.CLICK_BUTTON_RESET_PASSWORD: To reset your password, click the button below:
EmailTemplateMessages.PASSWORD_RESET_LINK_EXPIRY: This password reset link will expire in 30 minutes for security reasons.
EmailTemplateMessages.CONTACT_SUPPORT_IF_NOT_REQUESTED: If you did not request a password reset, please contact our support team immediately.
